Guanamar is a three star family hotel in Playa Carrillo - Guanacaste which has been operating for the last 25 years in the  North Pacific coast of Costa Rica, near the warm waters of Pacific ocean. The hotel is surrounded by the rich  and exuberant flora and fauna typical from the area. Guanamar is perfectly situated on the hill top at the southern end of the bay, inviting guests to enjoy the spectacular panoramic views and sunsets. Guanamar is located close to samara beach hotels (4miles) and just 1 mile from local airport (samara airport).
